Silver Star Café

New American/Roots $$$ Silver Star Village

Award-winning 'Hidden Gem' featured on Food Network's Diners, Drive-ins & Dives. True mom-and-pop operation where kids grew up in restaurants and now help run it. 360-degree mountain views with safe outdoor patio where little ones can wander while waiting for food. Live acoustic music Thu-Sat evenings.

Must-Try Dishes

  • Crispy Pork Belly
  • Elk Burger
  • Vegetarian Mushroom Stroganoff
  • Pork Osso Bucco
  • Artisan Pizza (kids love)
  • Wild Mushroom Tart

Features & Amenities

360 Degree Mountain Views Live Acoustic Music Ski In Ski Out Outdoor Patio Kids Menu Dog Friendly Patio Featured On Food Network

Perfect For

Family Dining Special Occasion Mountain Dining

Restaurant Information

Hours

Mon-Fri 11am-3pm & 5-9pm, Sat-Sun 9am-3pm & 5-9pm

Contact

1825 Three Kings Drive, Park City, UT 84060

435-655-3456
